00062 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00063 
00071 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00072 //include protection
00073 #ifndef SHA2ext_H
00074 #define SHA2ext_H
00075 
00076 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 //lenght defines
00078 #define SHA384_BLOCK_LENGTH             128
00079 #define SHA384_DIGEST_LENGTH            48
00080 #define SHA384_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH     (SHA384_DIGEST_LENGTH * 2 + 1)
00081 #define SHA512_BLOCK_LENGTH             128
00082 #define SHA512_DIGEST_LENGTH            64
00083 #define SHA512_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH     (SHA512_DIGEST_LENGTH * 2 + 1)
00084 #define SHA512_SHORT_BLOCK_LENGTH       (SHA512_BLOCK_LENGTH - 16)
00085 
00086 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00087 //hl includes
00088 #include "hl_types.h"
00089 
00090 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00091 //typedefs
00092 
00096 typedef hl_uint8  sha2_byte;    
00097 
00101 typedef hl_uint32 sha2_word32;  
00102 
00106 typedef hl_uint64 sha2_word64;  
00107 
00111 typedef struct SHA512_CTX 
00112 {
00113         hl_uint64       state[8];
00114         hl_uint64       bitcount[2];
00115         hl_uint8        buffer[SHA512_BLOCK_LENGTH];
00116 } SHA512_CTX;
00117 
00118 
00122 typedef SHA512_CTX SHA384_CTX;
00123 
00124 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00125 
00136 class SHA2ext
00137 {
00138         private:
00139 
00145                 void SHA384_Final(hl_uint8 digest[SHA384_DIGEST_LENGTH],
00146                                   SHA384_CTX* context);
00147 
00153                 void SHA512_Final(hl_uint8 digest[SHA512_DIGEST_LENGTH],
00154                                   SHA512_CTX* context);
00155 
00163                 void SHA512_Last(SHA512_CTX* context);
00164 
00170                 void SHA512_Transform(SHA512_CTX* context,
00171                                       const sha2_word64* data);
00172 
00173 
00174         public:
00175 
00180                 void SHA384_Init(SHA384_CTX* context);
00181 
00186                 void SHA512_Init(SHA512_CTX* context);
00187 
00194                 void SHA384_Update(SHA384_CTX* context,
00195                                    const hl_uint8* data,
00196                                    unsigned int len);
00197 
00204                 void SHA512_Update(SHA512_CTX* context,
00205                                    const hl_uint8* data,
00206                                    unsigned int len);
00207 
00215                 char* SHA384_End(SHA384_CTX* context,
00216                                  char buffer[SHA384_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH]);
00217 
00225                 char* SHA512_End(SHA512_CTX* context,
00226                                  char buffer[SHA512_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH]);
00227 
00228 };
